acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs with generified collections in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojoWithGenerifiedCollectionsInConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty

Then the collection should have exactly OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 4 byteObjectField = 106 shortField = 82 shortObjectField = 26 charField = g charObjectField = t intField = 598010874 intObjectField = 1785281576 longField = 247971669882220 longObjectField = 247971669792735 floatField = 0.5256783 floatObjectField = 0.20585531 doubleField = 0.9263040420138985 doubleObjectField = 0.6056165694495148 stringField = pRJHfcrmUX objectField = java.lang.Object@a3ece9d calendarField = Sat Jun 20 21:17:18 BST 2015 dateField = Sat Jun 20 21:17:18 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@34a5dc29 intArray = [I@3a7243e1 booleanArray = [Z@6ecd9708 bigDecimalField = 43927231042 ) elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{rIqjc1LRE8=java.util.GregorianCalendar[time=1434831438078 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly areFieldsSet=true elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@241eba9 elements
